Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

vCharacter = script.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso")
local count = 6 while myHumanoid and count > 0 do myHumanoid:TakeDamage(10) myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = myHumanoid.WalkSpeed - 16.0 count = count - 1 wait(1.0) end
if (myHumanoid.WalkSpeed + 8.0) < 20.0 then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = myHumanoid.WalkSpeed + 16.0 else myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end
if myTorso then fire = myTorso:FindFirstChild("Ice") if fire then fire:Remove() end end wait(1.0)
script:Destroy()

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
BallistaActive = Tool:WaitForChild("BallistaActive")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
ShieldStrength = 10 Damage = 50
Bolt = Instance.new("Part") Bolt.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block Bolt.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Bolt.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Bolt.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Bolt.CanCollide = false Bolt.Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.75, 3.5)
local BoltMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") BoltMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=156092226" BoltMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=156092201" BoltMesh.Parent = Bolt BoltMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.5, 1.5, 1.5)
local Float = Instance.new("BodyForce") Float.force = Vector3.new(0, Bolt:GetMass() * 196.1, 0) Float.Parent = Bolt
local Shield = Instance.new("Part") Shield.Shape = Enum.PartType.Ball Shield.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Shield.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Shield.CanCollide = false Shield.Anchored = true Shield.Size = Vector3.new(17, 17, 17) Shield.Transparency = 0.9
Tool.Enabled = true
function Blow(Hit, Missile) if Hit.Parent then humanoid = Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") f = Missile:FindFirstChild("Fire") if f then e = Instance.new("Explosion") e.Position = Missile.Position e.BlastRadius = 5.0 e.BlastPressure = 1000.0 e.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") end if humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid then if f then if Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("BallistaColdScript") == nil then newScript = Tool.BallistaColdScript:Clone() newScript.Parent = Hit.Parent newScript.Disabled = false end end creator = Missile:FindFirstChild("creator") if creator then creator.Parent = humanoid end humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) Debris:AddItem(creator, 1) end end
function restore() wait(12.0) ShieldStrength = 10 end
function Protect(Hit) if ShieldStrength > 0 then if Hit.Parent then humanoid = Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= Humanoid then humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 wait(1.0) if humanoid.WalkSpeed == 0.0 then humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end ShieldStrength = ShieldStrength - 1 end else if resCo == nil or coroutine.status(resCo) == 'dead' then resCo = coroutine.create(restore) coroutine.resume(resCo) end end end
function Shoot(Pos, Target) Missile = Bolt:Clone() if Ballista then if Target ~= Ballista.Position then fakeD = (Target - Ballista.Position).unit end LV = (Ballista.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0, 0)).lookVector signedAngle = LV:Dot(fakeD) if signedAngle < 0.5 then -- need to adjust fakeD -- get axis of rotation cross = LV:Cross(fakeD) -- get direction of rotation v1 = LV * 0.866 + cross:Cross(LV) * 0.5 + cross *(cross:Dot(LV)) * 0.134 v2 = LV * 0.866 + cross:Cross(LV) * -0.5 + cross *(cross:Dot(LV)) * 0.134 a1 = v1:Dot(fakeD) a2 = v2:Dot(fakeD) if a1 > a2 then fakeD = v1 else fakeD = v2 end -- rotate LV around axis of rotation by 30-degrees end end Missile.Velocity = fakeD * 120 local sPos = Character.PrimaryPart.Position sPos = sPos + fakeD.unit * 14 Missile.CFrame = Ballista.CFrame + Ballista.CFrame.lookVector * ((Ballista.Size.Z / 2) + (Missile.Size.Z / 2) + 1.5) Missile.CFrame = CFrame.new(Missile.Position, Target) Missile.Velocity = Missile.CFrame.lookVector * 120 Missile.Name = "Bolt" Missile.CanCollide = false local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = vPlayer creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = Missile Missile.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace")
Missile.Touched:connect(function(Hit) Blow(Hit, Missile) end) Debris:AddItem(Missile, 75) end
function Activated() if Tool.Enabled then Tool.Enabled = false if BallistaActive.Value == 0 then BallistaActive.Value = 1 Ballista = Handle:Clone() Ballista.Name = "Ballista" Ballista.Size = Vector3.new(8, 5, 8) Ballista.CFrame = Handle.CFrame Ballista.Position = (Torso.Position + (Torso.CFrame.lookVector * 6.0)) Ballista.CanCollide = true Ballista.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") local Smoke = Instance.new("Smoke") Debris:AddItem(Smoke, 1.4) Smoke.Parent = Ballista Ballista.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(3, 3, 3) Head.Anchored = true Ratio = (Humanoid.Health / Humanoid.MaxHealth) Humanoid.MaxHealth = 500 wait(0.1) Humanoid.Health = (Ratio * 500) else Target = Humanoid.TargetPoint local Direction = (Target - Ballista.Position).unit Shoot(Direction, Target) end wait(2) Tool.Enabled = true end end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Head = Character:FindFirstChild("Head") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Humanoid or not Torso then return end end
function Unequipped() if Head then Head.Anchored = false end if Ballista then Ballista:Destroy() end BallistaActive.Value = 0 Handle.Transparency = 0 if Humanoid then local Ratio = (Humanoid.Health / Humanoid.MaxHealth) Humanoid.MaxHealth = 100 wait(0.1) Humanoid.Health = Ratio * 100 end end
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)
